means: [地名] [加拿大、美国] 弗兰蒂尔

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"边界，边境"之意。
means: border ： 多指国与国之间或两地区的分界处，即分界线附近的边缘部分。
bounds ： 常与boundary换用，指土地边界，但意思不如boundary明确，主要用于抽象事物和文学作品中。
boundary ： 侧重地图上正式标定的、双方遵守的边界，也可指较小行政单位间的界线。
frontier ： 指两国接壤的前沿地区，属于各国的国境和边疆，多指设防的边界。
limit ： 含义广泛，常用作复数。指任何界限、范围、分界线外面的部分，可指有形或无形的东西。

sentence.Network_en: A "frontier-free" Europe implies a greatly increased market for all economic operators.
sentence.Network_cn: “无国界的”欧洲对所有经营者来说都意味着一个大大扩展了的市场。

sentence.Network_en: Until very recently Texas was an unsettled frontier.
sentence.Network_cn: 就在没多久之前，得克萨斯州还是一个荒无人烟的边远地区。

sentence.Network_en: the frontier between the land of the Saxons and that of the Danes
sentence.Network_cn: 撒克逊人土地和古斯堪的纳维亚人土地的边界

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中垂字的解释 ... ◎ 垂 chuí (2) 通“陲”。边疆;边境[ frontier] (3) 堂檐下靠阶的地方[ edge].
高三英语单词列表_百度知道 ... Kansas  n. 堪萨斯州(美国州名) frontier  n. 边疆;边界;国界 lose  one’s  way 迷路.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... barrier 障碍物，栅栏 frontier 边疆，边境 glacier 冰河，冰川.
宇字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 地域;疆土〖 territory〗 国境〖 frontier〗 住处〖 dwelling〗.

武汉婚纱摄影|皇宫婚纱摄影... ... Network pioneer 网络先锋 Fashion frontier 时尚前沿 Management team 管理团队.
双资产的效率前缘(efficient frontier)估计：多资产的效率前缘估计 – 以REITs基金为例本课程已通过青年就业赞计画审核，欲报名者欢 …
摩根士丹利金融词汇总览 ... FRN 浮息票据 Frontier trade 边境贸易 FTSE Index 伦敦金融时报指数 (又称富时指数).

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French frontiere, based on Latin frons, front- 'front'

entry.def: A frontier is a border between two countries.

example.ex: It wasn't difficult then to cross the frontier.
example.tran: 那时穿越边境并不困难。

entry.tran: 西部边疆,边远地区(指 20 世纪前美国西部欧洲移民尚未定居的部分)
entry.def: When you are talking about the western part of America before the twentieth century, you use frontier to refer to the area beyond the part settled by Europeans.

entry.tran: (尤指知识的)前沿，尖端，新领域
entry.def: The frontiers of something, especially knowledge, are the limits to which it extends.

means.word_mean: 1. a wilderness at the edge of a settled area of a country;

sentences.sentence: "the individualism of the frontier in Andrew Jackson's day"

means.word_mean: 2. an international boundary or the area (often fortified) immediately inside the boundary
3. an undeveloped field of study; a topic inviting research and development;

sentences.sentence: "he worked at the frontier of brain science"

auth_sentence.content: The 'black bands' who still Ravage the frontier.
auth_sentence.res_content: The 'black bands' who still Ravage the frontier.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The 'black bands' who still Ravage the frontier.

auth_sentence.content: Traversed the frontier between metaphysical speculation and empirical science.
auth_sentence.res_content: Traversed the frontier between metaphysical speculation and empirical science.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Traversed the frontier between metaphysical speculation and empirical science.

auth_sentence.content: Some Obama administration officials call it the elusive frontier.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some Obama administration officials call it the elusive frontier.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some Obama administration officials call it the elusive frontier.

stems_affixes.word_buile: barr栏+ier人或物→n.栅栏,屏障;障碍[物]
cash现金+ier人或物→n.收银员,出纳员
chandel=candle蜡烛+ier人或物→n.枝形吊灯[烛台]
finance金融+ier人或物→n.财政家,金融家
front前面+ier人或物→n.国境,边境;尖端,新领域
pacify调解+ier人或物→pacifier调停者,和解人

Sentence.sentence: Each burning season in the Amazon, fires deliberately set by frontier settlers and developers hurl up almost half a billion metric tons of carbon a year, placing Brazil among the top five contributors to greenhouse gases in the world.
As Santiago de la Mora, head of Google Books for Europe, puts it: "By making it possible to search the millions of books that exist today, we hope to expand the frontiers of human knowledge.

sentences.en: There have been large-scale military manoeuvres on the frontier.
sentences.cn: 边境地区曾有过大规模的军事演习。

means.word_mean: （尤指19世纪美国西部的）开发地区的边缘, 边远地区

sentences.en: Areas near the frontier were rough and lawless in the old days.
sentences.cn: 过去边远地区混乱不堪, 而且没有法律。

means.word_mean: 尚待开发的领域, 尖端; 前沿

sentences.en: They are highly interested in the frontiers of science.
sentences.cn: 他们对于科学的新领域有浓厚的兴趣。
